trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SEQ_00<tab>Saikoro's entire countenance reeks of desperation.
TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_TODO_02<tab>Defeat the shiranui and obtain the wakizashi.

TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_000<tab>Thank the kami for finally sending someone who I can turn to for help! Please, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I need you to do me a favor, but it is something that must stay between us.

TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_001<tab>The other day, I was out for a stroll in the <var 1A 02 /var>Kobayashi Maru<var 1A 01 /var> to the northeast of here when I came across a wakizashi. It was beautiful. When I went to grab it, however, this ghastly tentacled creature appeared from nowhere and chased me away!

TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_002<tab>I want that wakizashi so badly, but if I appeal to anyone here for assistance, they will laugh in my face again and call me a coward. Might you go there and obtain it for me?

TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_003<tab>Please, bring me the wakizashi I spotted in the <var 1A 02 /var>Kobayashi Maru<var 1A 01 /var>. It is to the northeast of here. Once I get it, maybe then everyone will stop teasing me!
TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You thoroughly search the area but are unable to find the wakizashi.
TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_020<tab>It was not there? Bah! That vile creature must have wrapped its slimy arms around it and taken it back to its home, then!
TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_021<tab>Please, you must track it down and seize my wakizashi from it. It is likely in Onokoro with all the other...<shudder>...sh-shiranui.
TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_022<tab>Those gruesome beasts all look very similar so you may have to confront a few of them before you find the one with my wakizashi.
TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_100_030<tab>Were you able to find my wakizashi?
TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_030<tab>Yes─this is it! Haha! At long last I have obtained my first treasure! Now I am a true Kojin of the Blue!
TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_031<tab>While I might not be the bravest, I do have the rare gift of seeing through people. Right away, I knew you were a kind and trustworthy individual.

TEXT_STMBDZ315_02711_SAIKORO_000_032<tab>This ability has served me well in trading and has allowed me to establish many good relationships with the people around me─such as yourself! May our friendship last a lifetime!
